word_list.definition: move swiftly and in an uncontrolled way in a specified direction
word_list.example: The door slammed to because it was on the careened side; and in a half second I was in the boat, and Jim come tumbling after me.

word_list.definition: having the color of tanned leather
word_list.example: None of them noticed a large, tawny owl flutter past the window.
